snippet.title: GRID Legends | Classic Car-Nage DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcoming the return of demolition derby to the GRID series plus eight new story events, five new vehicles, and much more, this is Classic Car-Nage, the first premium DLC for GRID Legends - available now on Xbox, PlayStation, and PC.

Read more: https://www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/news/classic-carnage-update

Pick up a 10-hour trial of GRID Legends right now through EA Play. EA Play Pro members can download the full Deluxe Edition: https://www.ea.com/ea-play

#GRIDLegends is OUT NOW on PlayStation, Xbox, Steam, and Origin. The Deluxe Edition includes Classic Car-Nage and three additional expansions releasing over the next few months.

Order now: www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/buy

🐦 Twitter | https://twitter.com/gridgame
📖 Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/gridgame
📸 Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/gridgame
